description: This repository includes a suite of simulation tests that can be used to validate new OpenStudio® model objects as well as ensure that objects continue to work after they are added. Each new OpenStudio Model object should ideally have two simulation tests associated with it: - a Ruby one which verifies the Ruby API and, - an OSM one that verifies the OSM file can be loaded with future versions of OpenStudio. Both tests should result in a simulation-ready OpenStudio Model that can be simulated using EnergyPlus®. Both of these tests are located in the /model/simulationtests directory, the easiest way to add a new test is to find a related existing test and modify it. When new tests are added they must be added to the model_tests.rb file.
name: OpenStudio® Resources [SWR-07-40]
